skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: marathi gurucharitra
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sai Baba is revered by many of his devotees as an incarnation of Sri Dattatreya and consider(ed) as Saguna Brahma. The prior incarnations of Dattatreya (Divine Trinity Brahma, Vishnu and Siva) include Shripada Shri Vallabha (around 1320 A.D – 1350 A.D) and Shri Narasimha Saraswati (around 1378 A.D – 1458 A.D). 

During Saibaba’s lifetime in Shirdi, Sai Baba used to request some of his ardent devotees to read Guru Charitra (by Sri Saraswati Gangadhar Sakhare based on life story of Shri Narasimha Saraswati) and blessed them. To date, Sai devotees across the world read Guru Charitra with same fervor as they love and read Sai Satcharitra. They both (Sai Satchritra and Guru Charitra) in essence impart the same light & teachings but written during different time periods. We suggest all Sai devotees to listen, assimilate and drink the nectar of this holy book! May Sai and Dattatreya bless you.

Guru Charitra in Marathi is a part of our popular Shirdi Sai Baba All-In-One App that is available across App stores and is by OmniSai.Org, a US 501(C)(3) Nonprofit Organization. We have App users / Site visitors from 150 countries, 49 states in USA, all 29 states in India and from ~3000 cities Worldwide. The most comprehensive Free "App / Resource For And by Sai Volunteers!". No Ads, No Hidden Agenda! We do not collect user data or monetize through any means. Simply experience the best! We intend to never advertise in our apps or on our website and intend to keep this service always FREE.
